short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A decentralized wallet that supports Web3 activities. Chain support(ETH/BSC/TRON/PUT/SOL/ZETA).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Broearn Wallet supports PUT/SOL/EVM(ETH, BSC,TRON,ZETA,MATIC) and other mainstream public chains one after another. The wallet's private key, mnemonic phrase, and password are stored on your device, and all information is encrypted and decrypted by the password.
